titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for the maintenance and encrease of the mines of saltpeter, and the true making of gunpowder, and reforming abuses concerning the same.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at the Court at White-Hall, the thirteenth day of April, in the first yeere of his Maiesties Reigne of England, France, and Ireland, and of Scotland the eight and fiftieth."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie
